biography.bio: Musclebound actor Richard Harrison was one of a slew of handsome young American pectoral hunks of the late 50s whose career in Hollywood amounted to little more than brawny bits until being lured to Italy and churning out the sword-and-sandal pictures that became an early 60s craze. Harrison would end up making over 100 films due to this lucky trek abroad. Born on May 26, 1936 in Salt Lake City, he relocated to sunny Southern California in his late teens where his blond, tanned, chiseled good looks (he was sometimes mistaken for handsome actor Guy Madison) landed him modeling work both on runways and in beefcake magazines. It didn't take long for him to be noticed by Hollywood casting agents. At first cast in small he-man roles, usually as a virile guy in uniform, he can be obscurely seen in Jeanne Eagels (1957), his film debut starring Kim Novak, Kronos (1957) with Jeff Morrow, Too Much, Too Soon (1958) starring Dorothy Malone, South Pacific (1958), in which he can be glimpsed as a co-pilot, and Battle Flame (1959) with Scott Brady and a young Robert Blake. While filming another minor role in Master of the World (1961) he met producer James H. Nicholson's daughter, Loretta, and married her within six months. The couple produced three sons. Frustrated at not being able to secure meatier roles in Hollywood, Richard jumped at the chance when offered the lead role in The Invincible Gladiator (1961) [The Invincible Gladiator] which was filming in Europe. He wound up settling in Italy for the next two decades. His first role, of course, immediately typed him as another Steve Reeves type and, to avoid being penned in too much as a mythological muscle man, he sought roles in routine spaghetti westerns and spy intrigue. Once Italy closed down film production after the Herculean craze had died down, he, like others, found himself unemployed. He did manage to scrape up work in Hong Kong, but a large portion of them were bottom-of-the-barrel Ninja movies. Remarried in 1978, Harrison had already begun acting less and less while delving into producing and directing. He has retired fully now except perhaps for an occasional script writing assignment.
biography.name: Richard Harrison

biography.bio: Dave Wheeler is an actor, known for The Ninja Squad (1986), Ninja Commandments (1987) and The Adventure of Faustus Bidgood (1986).
biography.name: Dave Wheeler

biography.bio: Peter Kjær is an actor, known for Ninja Commandments (1987), The Power of Ninjitsu (1988) and Jiang shi yi sheng (1990).
biography.name: Peter Kjær

biography.bio: Adam Frank earned his BA in Theatre from the University of Arizona and his Ph.D. in Anthropology from the University of Texas at Austin. On stage, he has performed in recent years with the Arkansas Shakespeare Theatre, the Will Geer Theatricum Botanicum, and Mabou Mines. His professional voice work includes dubbing more than 100 kung fu movies and TV serials in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Adam Frank

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Christine yet.
biography.name: Christine

biography.bio: Huisintyeld Paul is an actor, known for Ninja Kill (1987), Ninja Commandments (1987) and The Ninja Showdown (1988).
biography.name: Huisintyeld Paul

biography.bio: Timothy Alberto is an actor, known for Ninja Commandments (1987).
biography.name: Timothy Alberto

biography.bio: Louis Roth was born in June 1947 in New York, USA. He was an actor and writer, known for Kickboxer (1989), The Legend of Drunken Master (1994) and A Better Tomorrow II (1987). He died in 1994 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Louis Roth

biography.bio: Hui-Shan Yang was born on July 16, 1952 in Taichung, Taiwan. She is an actress, known for Wo zhe yang guo le yi sheng (1985), Teenage Fugitive (1984) and This Love of Mine (1986).
biography.name: Hui-Shan Yang

biography.bio: Hsiao-Fei Li is an actor, known for Ling chen liu dian qiang sheng (1979), Streamrolling (1982) and Ma ma zai ai wo yi ci (1988).
biography.name: Hsiao-Fei Li

biography.bio: Sha Ma is known for his work on Never Too Late to Repent (1979), Du ming yi tiao long (1981) and Hei shi fu ren (1982).
biography.name: Sha Ma

biography.bio: Teddy Ngai is an actor, known for Ninja Commandments (1987), The Ninja Showdown (1988) and Black Ninja (1987).
biography.name: Teddy Ngai

biography.bio: Kor Chung Hung is an actor, known for Zhi fen zhi bing (1982) and Ninja Commandments (1987).
biography.name: Kor Chung Hung

biography.bio: Celia Kong is an actress, known for Concentrational Camp for Girls (1986) and Ninja Commandments (1987).
biography.name: Celia Kong
